ygData.subject: You've Had Too Much EQ If..........

ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
Subject: You've Had Too Much EQ If..........


Driving along and chatting on the cell phone, you turn on to the freeway and
remark, "Zoning."

You only near the wall in the local shopping mall.

You notice people sitting on park benches and complain, "Damn campers."

When buying groceries, you sneak behind the cashier in hopes of getting
better prices.

After buying new clothes, you quickly change into them and shout, "Smelly T
Shirt and Faded Jeans for sale!'

Walking along the beach, you see a teenager in a torn shirt and ask him if
he'd like some good woven armor.

You notice a girl in a bikini and slyly ask if her if she needs help finding
her corpse.

And of course, you always buy your beer because it's cheaper than brewing
your own.



1. You have to squelch a cry of "Griff" when you catch a glimpse of a
low-flying small aircraft.
>
>2. You mutter "Why don't people loot their kills" as you pass a dead animal
on the side of the road.
>
>3. You finally camp for the night, and reaching your bedroom, say "Hail, a
irate spouse".



4) When your spouse enters the room and sees you at the computer, she
automatically cons red and "poised ready to attack - what would you like
your tombstone to say?"
>
>5) You know the family pet will give you no exp, but you really need a pair
of fur-lined gloves.....
